data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 4,005 believers living in the state of Saint Peter. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Peter, Barbados
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Saint Peter.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Saint Peter prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Saint Peter, Barbados a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Speightstown
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Speightstown, Saint Peter, Barbados.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Saint Peter hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Saint Peter that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Peter, Barbados has a population of 11,900.

We estimate Saint Peter has 4,005 people who might know Jesus, 7,016 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 880 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 4,005 believers in Saint Peter.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me
